thread.title: Food & Drink Events (Oct. 19 - 25, 2015)

title: Food & Drink Events (Oct. 19 - 25, 2015)
text:
Diners participate in the interactive murder mystery game by exploring clues, questioning one another and solving the crime during a three-course meal served in a private dining room. Tickets are $80. 
Oct 22Sea to Table â€” Sustainable Seafoodand Wine Pairing 6 p.m.-8 p.m. Thursday www.wholefoodsmarket.com/stores/broadstreet Chefs Ryan Prewitt of Peche Seafood Grill, Alan Ehrich of the Audubon Nature Institute and Liberty's Kitchen culinary students present tapas dishes featuring sustainably harvested Gulf seafood. The event benefits Audubon Nature Institute's G.U.L.F. program and Louisiana Sea Grant. Reservations recommended. Call (504) 434-3364 ext. 106 for information. Tickets $25.
